data.message: Hi, I'm trying to help a friend who is a great advocate of individuals (both children and adults) with special needs.  He is looking to communicate with someone from Facebook to discuss unique Facebook profile considerations that apply to these individuals.  These considerations include protecting these individuals from certain risks associated with navigating the internet as well as being taken advantage of.  Can you tell me how I can help my friend start a conversation with Facebook on this topic?  Thanks!

replies.message: Hey there, Kevin. We believe safety is a conversation and a shared responsibility among all of us. You can learn more about how to stay safe on Facebook here: http://on.fb.me/22JrxGl. If you or your friend have suggestions, we'd love to hear them here:  http://on.fb.me/1mE3xmU.  Thanks. -Jordan
Thanks Jordan,  I will put together a response with suggestions to the site you've shared.  Much appreciated
